EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
Personalization Analytics

You can visualize Personalization pipeline analytics using the Personalization Intelligence app in Analytics Studio. Using Tableau or another business intelligence app, you can view Einstein Personalization attribution metrics. You can also view Einstein Personalization analytics using any Java database connectivity (JDBC) compatible client.

Types of Einstein Personalization Analytics
The Personalization Intelligence app provides two types of analytics—Personalization pipeline intelligence and Personalization attribution intelligence.
Attribution Settings for Restricted GA
For restricted GA, we’ve provided four attribution DMOs.  These DMOs gather metrics using specific engagement models, settings, metrics, and attribution rules.
Visualize Personalization Pipeline Intelligence
The Personalization Intelligence app provides insights into the health and performance of your Personalization pipeline. Use Analytics Studio to create and view the app.
View Pipeline Analytics Dashboard Inside Personalization App
You can view the pipeline analytics graphs and metrics directly in the Einstein Personalization app by creating an app page and adding the Analytics dashboard to it.
Visualize Attribution Intelligence Using Tableau
You can use Tableau to view and analyze attribution metrics. By connecting Data Cloud data model objects using the built-in Salesforce Data Cloud connector in Tableau, you can analyze your attribution data in near real time.
Personalization Intelligence SQL Queries
You can view Einstein Personalization analytics using any Java database connectivity (JDBC) compatible client to connect to Data Cloud and run queries against the data model objects.
